attributes.review: This app is just so boring. Low quality graphics and terrible mechanics. 0/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: Bruh.

attributes.review: Terrible, I saw the name of the app which instantaneously made me nauseous, the I proceeded to download it got a glimpse at the content deleted it and gave it one star I suggest you do the same.
Called me racist names just because I didn’t want to vote for trump I only installed because I wanted to see the news through here
attributes.title: Racist

attributes.review: if i could rate zero stars i would. this app THREATENED me. Text popped up on the screen that said “die f*ggot” before my phone shut off permanently and i had to replace it. This happen to anyone else?
attributes.title: WORST APP!! DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app is absolutely awful took forever to download and just has plain out bad programming also who would want a app that supports a racist homophobic transphobic xenophobic sexist rapist idiot NOT ME

attributes.review: So i downloaded and i didn’t expect it to take 20 mins to download?!! it’s very slow and ate my phone battery. i do NOT recommend this app for anybody...

attributes.review: This app completely wiped my bank account and took my money. I have been struggling to pay rent and I am now being evicted. This app changed my life 😢
